name: CMIOExtensionDeviceProperties
desc: An object that defines the properties of a device.

items.name: init(dictionary: [CMIOExtensionProperty : CMIOExtensionPropertyState<AnyObject>])
items.desc: Creates a properties object with a dictionary of property states.

items.name: var linkedCoreAudioDeviceUID: String?
items.desc: A universal identifier of the audio device linked to this device.

items.name: var transportType: Int?
items.desc: The transport type of the device, such as USB or HDMI.

items.name: var suspended: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the device is in a suspended state.

items.name: func setPropertyState(CMIOExtensionPropertyState<AnyObject>?, forProperty: CMIOExtensionProperty)
items.desc: Sets the value of a device property.

items.name: var propertiesDictionary: [CMIOExtensionProperty : CMIOExtensionPropertyState<AnyObject>]
items.desc: A dictionary of properties for a device.
